Text1: iMSN is a company that primarily deals with projecting, developing and implementation of complete systems in the area of information technologies. We are adjusting our solutions to your individual demands and meeting your needs. Our work is focused and inspired by natural processes, their complexity and constant challenges they represent.
Text2: PlanTECH is a software system for support in deciding in agriculture. The system is developing by using modern technologies and it is adjusted for work on more types of devices (desktop, tablet, telephone). System of measuring instruments that is arranged on plantations of farmers gathers needed information, using meteorological and hydrological forecasts, as well as expert knowledge in this area gives advice to a farmer what is necessary to undertake on specific plantage.
Text3: Agriculture in Serbia is at a very low technological level, which results in notably less income. Very fast progress of information-communication technologies has brought the occurrence of large number of methods, devices and software with which, with minimum investment, production can be improved considerably.
r2: On next login you will get form for sending deposit slip, example below
unesiteImeNoveKulture: Enter the name of a new culture
Name: Name
imeNove: Enter the name of a new subculture
pregledNove: Overview of Culture and add new
izaberi novu: Select Culture to add a new culture or display all its types
novaK: Enter the name of the new types
kraj: To finish drawing click on yellow circle
unesite naziv podkulture: Enter the name of the subculture
unesite naziv dobavljaca: Enter the name of the supplier
kulture za koje vazi pravilo: Cultures for which the rule applies to
parcele na kojima pravilo vazi: Plantations for which the rule applies to
izaberite prioritet pravila: Choose the priority of the rule
Crveno-veoma bitno,Narandzasto-bitno,Zel: Red - very important, Orange - important, Green - optional
Ne možete dodati novu parcelu: You can not add a new plantation
Ne možete dodati novi senzor: You can not add new sensor
subSlider1: The discovery of agriculture was the first big step toward a civilized life. This is next!
subSlider2: Always do Your best. What You plant now, You will harvest later!
subSlider3: Your mind is a garden, Your thoughts are seeds, You can grow flowers or You can grow weeds!
Ime je jedna rec i treba da sadrzi samo: First name is one word, and should contain only letters
Prezime je jedna rec i treba da sadrzi s: Last name is one word, and should contain only letters
Korisnicko ime moze da sadrzi samo mala: 'Username can contain only lowercase letters and numbers. Length should be bettwen 8 and 16 characters'
Lozinka moze da sadrzi samo mala slova i: 'Password can contain only lowercase letters and numbers. Length should be bettwen 8 and 16 characters'
Ponovljena lozinka nije jednaka unetoj l: Repeated password is not the same password inputed
E-mail adresa nije u ispravnom obliku: E-mail address is not in the correct format
Broj telefona nije u ispravnom obliku: Phone number is not in the correct format
Dodajte kulture koje se nalazi na parcel: Add culture located on a plantation
Obelezite u koliko zelite da stavka iz l: Check if you want the item to disappear from the list after dragging it on the calendar
Zdravo ja sam Korenko, tvoj virtuelni as: Hi, I'm Korenko, your virtual assistant. As I turned on you can not only use application carefully follow my instructions
Postavite obavestenje i prioritet pravil: Set the notification and priority rules
Pravilo je primenljivo na svim plantažam: The rule is applicable to all plantations. You can choose if you want to, and certain plantations that will apply the rule
